constantValues:
Typically tracks an abundance of constituent or organization information that doesn't live cleanly on an account or contact record or that can be associated with both an account and a contact.  Examples:  personal interests, additional communication preferences such as interest in a newsletter, specific outreach that the constituent wants, and additional affiliation information, such as constituent type associations and ratings.

Preferences also typically store demographic information in a series of dependent picklists: Category, Subcategory, Type, Subtype. Most commonly, only two or three of the fields in this dependent hierarchy will be used.

definitions.description:
Typically tracks an abundance of constituent or organization information that doesn't live cleanly on an account or contact record or that can be associated with both an account and a contact.  Examples:  personal interests, additional communication preferences such as interest in a newsletter, specific outreach that the constituent wants, and additional affiliation information, such as constituent type associations and ratings.

Preferences also typically store demographic information in a series of dependent picklists: Category, Subcategory, Type, Subtype. Most commonly, only two or three of the fields in this dependent hierarchy will be used.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Preference' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
arguments.name: stateCode_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Preference' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
arguments.name: statusCode_display

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Preference

members.description: Reason for the status of the Preference

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'msnfpConfidence_display' is added to the 'Preference' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'msnfpConfidence'
arguments.name: confidence_display

members.name: confidence

constantValues: Specifies the confidence that the Preference is accurate.

members.description: Specifies the confidence that the Preference is accurate.

members.name: endDate

constantValues: Indicates the date this preference ends and ceases to be valid.

members.description: Indicates the date this preference ends and ceases to be valid.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'msnfpKey_display' is added to the 'Preference' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'msnfpKey'
arguments.name: key_display

members.name: key

constantValues: The referenced Preference Key to which this record attaches a value or "true"

members.description: The referenced Preference Key to which this record attaches a value or "true"

members.name: priority

constantValues: A numeric priority that may be used to disambiguate multiple preference values expressed for the same key, which may have differing effective dates.

members.description: A numeric priority that may be used to disambiguate multiple preference values expressed for the same key, which may have differing effective dates.

members.name: startDate

constantValues: Indicates the date this preference begins.

members.description: Indicates the date this preference begins.

members.name: value

constantValues: The user-entered value that may be attached to the referenced key. If none is present, default interpretation is "true"

members.description: The user-entered value that may be attached to the referenced key. If none is present, default interpretation is "true"

members.name: weight

constantValues: Holds an integral value that may be incremented as the preference is re-expressed or emphasized by the Customer

members.description: Holds an integral value that may be incremented as the preference is re-expressed or emphasized by the Customer
